state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled milk. -= Bedroom =- You're now in the bedroom. Were you looking for a chest drawer? Because look over there, it's a chest drawer. You can make out a closed antique trunk in the corner. If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a king-size bed. The king-size bed is usual. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1

next_state: -= Kitchen =- Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a kitchen. You can see a closed refrigerator here. What's that over there? It looks like it's a counter. The counter is usual. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it? Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a stove. The stove is normal. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a kitchen island. The kitchen island is usual. On the kitchen island you make out a note. There is a closed screen door leading east. There is an open wooden door leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-1/6
